point1: As a Full Stack Developer Intern at FMX Proptech Pvt. Ltd., Sameer Gupta leveraged his technical expertise to develop the frontend and backend of a Visitor Management System, showcasing his proficiency in JavaScript, Node.js, and Express.
point2: Notably, Sameer Gupta designed and developed CosmosAI - AI Generated Game, a Procedural Content Generation and Dynamic Difficulty Adjustment system utilizing Deep Q-Learning and Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) to create engaging game levels.
point3: With a strong technical foundation in programming languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python, Sameer Gupta is well-versed in frameworks like ReactJS, Next.js, and Node.js, and databases such as MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.
point4: Sameer Gupta's industry knowledge and exposure to financial services and corporate strategies through the J.P. Morgan External Engagement Program have equipped him with a deep understanding of the sector and its nuances.
point5: As a versatile and innovative developer, Sameer Gupta's greatest strength lies in his ability to integrate cutting-edge technologies and deliver scalable solutions that seamlessly blend functionality and user experience.
